channel.title: Rs 2007 friends
channel.description:
Hey guys whats up, before I go on this is strictly RS 2007, I do not play EoC or the newer version of RS. I'm looking for people who still actually play RS 2007 because I want to get back into it but my problem is I have absoloutly nobody to play it with. And lets face facts, it isn't like it was in the old days where a lot of people were playing so you could just go out in the world and meet people. It's hard to find mature people to play the game with so anybody who is interested, just shoot me a PM when im online or something.
IGN: Redbandit87

item.title: Rs 2007 friends
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Sent you a pm, for anyone else that wants to add me my in game name is Define Titan.

Read full topic
